title:
Can you publish the name of the designer of the market st flower box?  How can the designer be made responsible?

This is the most historic spot in Wilmington.  Why so little design thought?
text:
It's hard to say it was the designer's fault. In effect, Richard
King told us that the designer was operating from an inaccurate map
given to him (or her) by the city, and so the scale was off. He said
he did not know offhand the name of the designer.
